com.hazelcast.internal.memory

Interface MemoryAccessor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConcurrentMemoryAccessor, GlobalMemoryAccessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlignmentAwareMemoryAccessor, StandardMemoryAccessor

    public interface MemoryAccessor
    Abstraction over an address space of readable and writable bytes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyFromByteArray(byte[] source, int offset, long destAddress, int length)
      Copies bytes from a Java byte array into this accessor's address space.
      void copyMemory(long srcAddress, long destAddress, long lengthBytes)
      Copies memory from given source address to given destination address as given size.
      void copyToByteArray(long srcAddress, byte[] destination, int offset, int length)
      Copies bytes from this accessor's address space to a Java byte array.

      Reads the boolean value from given address.

    • Method Detail

      • isBigEndian

        boolean isBigEndian()
        Tells whether this memory accessor is big- or little-endian. This applies to all the multibyte-width methods of integral type (get/putChar, get/putShort, get/putInt, get/putLong declared in this interface and others declared in subinterfaces).
        Returns:
        true if the accessor is big-endian; false otherwise

      • getBoolean

        boolean getBoolean(long address)
        Reads the boolean value from given address.
        Parameters:
        address - the address where the boolean value will be read from
        Returns:
        the value that is read

      • putBoolean

        void putBoolean(long address,
                boolean x)
        Writes the given boolean value to given address.
        Parameters:
        address - the address where the boolean value will be written to
        x - the boolean value to be written

      • getByte

        byte getByte(long address)
        Reads the byte value from given address.
        Parameters:
        address - the address where the byte value will be read from
        Returns:
        the byte value that was read

        x - the byte value to be written

      • copyMemory

        void copyMemory(long srcAddress,
                long destAddress,
                long lengthBytes)
        Copies memory from given source address to given destination address as given size.
        Parameters:
        srcAddress - the source address to be copied from
        destAddress - the destination address to be copied to
        lengthBytes - the number of bytes to be copied

      • copyFromByteArray

        void copyFromByteArray(byte[] source,
                       int offset,
                       long destAddress,
                       int length)
        Copies bytes from a Java byte array into this accessor's address space.
        Parameters:
        source - the source byte array
        offset - index of the first byte to copy
        destAddress - address where the first byte will be written
        length - number of bytes to copy

      • copyToByteArray

        void copyToByteArray(long srcAddress,
                     byte[] destination,
                     int offset,
                     int length)
        Copies bytes from this accessor's address space to a Java byte array.
        Parameters:
        srcAddress - address of the first byte to copy
        destination - the destination byte array
        offset - array index where the first byte will be written
        length - number of bytes to copy

      • setMemory

        void setMemory(long address,
               long lengthBytes,
               byte value)
        Sets memory with given value from specified address as given size.
        Parameters:
        address - the start address of the memory region which will be set with the given value
        lengthBytes - the number of bytes to be set
        value - the value to be set
